title: A.B.C. Cocktail
garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino cherry
recipe: TEAR mint and place in shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
ingredients: [['7 fresh', 'Mint leaves'], ['3 cl', 'Tawny port'], ['3 cl', 'Rémy Martin 1738 Cognac'], ['0.75 cl', 'Luxardo Maraschino liqueur'], ['0.5 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absinthe Cocktail
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
ingredients: [['3 cl', 'La Fée Parisienne absinthe'], ['7.5 cl', 'Chilled water'], ['0.75 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absinthe Frappé
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) and serve with straws.
ingredients: [['4.5 cl', 'La Fée Parisienne absinthe'], ['1.5 cl', 'Anisette liqueur'], ['4.5 cl', 'Chilled water'], ['0.75 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absinthe Sour
garnish: Lemon zest twist & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
ingredients: [['2.5 cl', 'La Fée Parisienne absinthe'], ['1 cl', 'Sugar syrup (65.0°brix, 2 sugar to 1 water rich syrup)'], ['1.5 cl', 'Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)'], ['1.5 cl', 'Pasteurised egg white'], ['2 dash', "Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters (optional)"]]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absinthe Suisesse
recipe: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
ingredients: [['4.5 cl', 'La Fée Parisienne absinthe'], ['1.5 cl', 'Giffard Orgeat Syrup'], ['3 cl', 'Pasteurised egg white'], ['1.5 cl', 'Milk (semi-skimmed/2% fat)'], ['1.5 cl', 'Single cream / half-and-half']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absinthe Without Leave
recipe: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order.
ingredients: [['2.25 cl', 'Pisang Ambon green banana liqueur'], ['2.25 cl', 'Irish cream liqueur'], ['1.5 cl', 'La Fée Parisienne absinthe']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com

title: Absolutely Fabulous
recipe: SHAKE first two ingredients with ice and strain into glass. TOP with champagne.
ingredients: [['3 cl', 'Ketel One Vodka'], ['4.5 cl', 'Cranberry juice (sweetened)'], ['4.5 cl', 'Brut Champagne']]
Rating Sources: Difford's Guide, Make Me a Cocktail, Kindred Cocktails, Moody Mixologist, Liquor.com, Gastronom Cocktails, sipsnibblesbites.com, Liquor.com
